title: France panorama. [No. 68/21]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. What is at stake in the French elections - The events leading up the dissolution of the French National Assembly and making ready for the new legislative elections. 2. Techniques - 765,000 volt circuit-breakers for the US. Near Paris, finishing touches on a revolutionary combustion-cell. 3. School for aces - Test Pilots’ School: routine coasting-tests for transport with feathered engines. The arts - Pierre-Yves Tremois, one of the best French engravers of the modern school.
